p: To the best of our knowledge, no reports regarding the enzyme inhibition of Astragalus essential oils were available, only some studies on the enzyme inhibitory effects of extracts from the members of Astragalus [ 27, 28, 29]. The presented results could open new windows for potential medical applications of the members of Astragalus. Comparing our present results with those for Ferula essential oils, it was seen that the latter showed superior activity [ 30].
